name: Don't mess with my papitas
description:
Don't mess with my papitas is a game about saving (lil)potatoes.

This is a submission for the LD51: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/51/dont-mess-with-my-papitas

Controls:

WASD: Movement
Left Click: Attack
Right Click: Interaction (Plant seeds, harvest and buy seeds)

Description:

Plant potatoes to get the best score! each (lil)potato takes 10 seconds to grow.
Buy seeds from the merchant to plant more (you start with only 1!)
Every ten seconds a horde of slimes will try to eat your potatoes!

DON'T LET THEM EAT YOUR POTATOES! YOU MUST RESIST!

Created by: https://twitter.com/countess_patata and https://twitter.com/roger_duran
